title: Massive Capcom Leak  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.16.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about a huge leak from Capcom.

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:52 - KFGD Intro
00:04:36 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:52 - Capcom has suffered a huge leak - Emma Kent @ Eurogamer
00:14:07 - An Oxford study says: Video gaming can benefit mental health - Alex Hern @ The Guardian
00:23:42 - 2020 Video Game Accessibility Awards Announced - Steve Watts @ Gamespot
00:28:20 - Demon’s Souls remake players discover secret door that wasn’t in original game - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:36:40 - THQ Nordic claims its ‘TimeSplitters 2 Remake’ reference was a joke - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:38:52 - Update from Friday: Everything is okay at Ubisoft Montreal
00:40:16 -  Ad  
00:45:38 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:47:02 - If EA can release buggy and uninspired iterations of their sports games and still chart extremely well in game sales,  why would they ever try to improve? - Nick
00:53:45 - Is anyone else having similar issues, or does this mean my hands have finally met their match and I may develop hand issues my parents used to warn me about as a kid playing games all day? - TheBusDriver05
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran
